alert.note: Alert for Branch; Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 2:59AM EST until January 25 at 8:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST /7 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...From 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ to 8 PM EST /7 PM CST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will likely impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will spread quickly north early today with rapid accumulations before noon. The snow will then become lighter by late afternoon, although blowing and drifting snow in open areas is likely to persist into the evening. Additional but mostly lighter snow is expected tonight into Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Branch; Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph
